section.title: Changing the CD for a Virtual Machine
section.para: You can change the CD accessible to a virtual machine while that virtual machine is running.

note.para: You can only use ISO files that have been added to the ISO domain of the virtual machine's cluster.

procedure.title: Changing the CD for a Virtual Machine

step.para: Click the Virtual Machines tab and select a running virtual machine.
Select an option from the drop-down list:
Select an ISO file from the list to eject the CD currently accessible to the virtual machine and mount that ISO file as a CD.
Select [Eject] from the list to eject the CD currently accessible to the virtual machine.
